name: Snowman Slopedown
description:
A game made for the three day Unreal Engine 4 GameJam in December 2016.

You are playing the snowman Slowlaf, a "slower" brother of Frozen´s Snowman Olaf who is trying to reach the end of the slope.

Dangers!

  • Hits can break you
  • You lose snow as you roll and when you jump - Replenish with snow! (But watch out from the rolling snowballs, collect only the tripple-group of snow standing still)
  • Careful of large jumps, use boosts where possible!

Team:

Controls:

Keyboard:

WASD - Movement
Mouse - Yaw and pitch
E - Cycle songs
Space - Jump
Escape - Pause

Gamepad:

Left Stick - Movement
Right Stick - Yaw and pitch
Right Shoulder - Cycle songs
Right Trigger - Jump
Middle Right - Pause

Outsourced Assets:

Advanced cel shader pack by Antidamage/Skull https://www.unrealengine.com/marketp...el-shader-pack
Sound effects and music all from http://opengameart.org
